author: cms-tsg-storm
body: Replace the frozen version version of the 50ns HLT menu in the release: instead of the latest and greatest menu that we had included before (but at the end never used because of the problem with the solenoid) another version was chosen which is more similar to the one applied mostly during the data taking at 50ns.
title: Legacy 50ns frozen HLT menu in the release 76X
